quest.name: Ponder, Warrant, Cherish, Welcome
journal: Having found the wayward ambystoma, Hermes is the picture of relief.
objectives: Speak with Meteion and have her accompany you.
Speak with Memnon while accompanied by Meteion.
Search for idle creations while accompanied by Meteion.
Speak with Euanthe while accompanied by Meteion.
Speak with Hermes while accompanied by Meteion.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: The tenet of the Words of Mitron is to create aquatic life both unique and beneficial. Aquatic.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: What would possess them to put this creature in the sky? And is it even aquatic to begin with...?

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: The ambystoma was submitted to the bureau not long ago, and I'm pleased to see it has found its way here.

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: We'll make sure these little ones don't wander off like their adventurous fellow. Go on and lend Hermes a hand.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I'm glad they're safe! Hermes and the ambystoma!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The ambystoma stares at you unflinchingly, as if regarding something novel.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Regarding it in turn, you notice that it appears to be floating, if ever so slightly.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Well, we mustn't keep the others waiting. Let us return to Anagnorisis.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: No more errant creations to distract us from matters of actual import, I trust.

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: 'Twas blissfully uneventful in your absence. The little ones were on their best behavior.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Some creations stay outside. Others stay at Ktisis. Like the ambystomas!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Perhaps it's only your imagination, but something in the creature's demeanor bespeaks proud defiance for having gone on an adventure.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: My apologies for the trouble. Owing to your kind assistance, all the ambystomas are safe and well.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: I will presently send them back to their space, if you would go on ahead to the main building.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Upon entering, you will see a table and chairs─a meeting area. We may speak there.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: Very well. Take care not to let the creatures slip away again.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Will you be attending as well? If so, you should join the others at the building.

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: While Emet-Selch has been accommodating thus far, he is the one who has business with Hermes. If you wish to attend, you will have to ask his permission.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: Most would jump at the chance to serve in the Convocation. And yet...

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: Don't mind us, my friend. Please tend to Meteion.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Forgive me. I will make it up to you, I promise.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Forename... I didn't want─ Didn't mean─ <sigh>

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: ...A walk. Perhaps we can go for a walk?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes gets sad. When he thinks about death.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: When others are sad, I'm sad too. That's how I am. How he made me.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But don't worry. I'm fine now.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: So...why did you come here?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: You want to learn about Elpis and Hermes? Ooh, ooh, teach you! I can teach you!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: We could take turns! I tell you something...then you tell me something!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sounds like fun!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sure, why not.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sounds like a bother...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: It will be! It will be!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Then it's settled!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Awww... I won't be a bother. So please, Forename. Please!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hehe, you won't regret it! I'll teach you lots and lots of things!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Um, where to start... Ah, yes! Let's talk to Memnon. He should be near the aetheryte.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I'm not good at explaining, but Memnon is. So I'll have him explain instead.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Meteion is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Meteion behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Meteion accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Discuss the aetheryte.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's go and talk to Memnon. He should be near the aetheryte.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Meteion?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh, are you busy? Then I'll wait at the building.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back! Let's go, let's go!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Meteion has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ah, the aetheryte. Anyone can use it to teleport anywhere!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Well, maybe not anywhere. Not to the ground or other isles.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: For that, you need teleporters. Oh, and permission!

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: And what have we here...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should have Meteion accompanying you before initiating conversation.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: And what have we here...?

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: Though you look like a person, your aether is quite thinyou could as easily pass for a toyyou have the ears and tail of a beastyou have a remarkably large and robust physiqueyou have the horns and scales of a beastyou have the features of a beastyou have the ears of a beast... I assume you are a familiar like Meteion. Is there something you need?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: This is Forename. Could you teach herhim about Elpis?

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: Ah, a newly arrived familiar, is shehe? Very well, I should be glad to introduce our fair facility to herhim.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: As you know, it is mankind's duty to make the star a better place. As part of this duty, we employ creation magicks to bring forth new life.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: However, we cannot simply release our works into the world, for it would lead to chaos.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: No, any and all life-forms must undergo extensive testing to determine their fitness to exist. Testing which is conducted here in Elpis.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: Every candidate is subjected to rigorous study, in which we identify their properties, surmise what habitats might be suitable, and speculate as to the effects they may have on the environment and other species.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: Should it be judged a beneficial addition to the star, it will be allowed to take its place in the world.

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: The two of you, too, were created with the hope of making the star a better place. So heed your masters well and be good, do you hear?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: We will, Memnon, we will. Thanks for the lesson!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: You had a turn. Now I get a turn!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Where did you come from?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: From a place far, far away.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: From a place facing a great threat.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: From the Crystarium...I guess?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hmmm, then I probably don't know it. I don't know much about other places.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Th-There's such a place? I had no idea...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Crys...tarium? I've never heard of it.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But this place is important to you. I can feel it.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh, my power! I haven't told you about it.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: A creation. Let's find a creation. One not being watched. Then I'll explain my power!

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Discuss the spriggans.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's find a creation. One not being watched. Then I'll explain my power!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: ...Spriggans? What are spriggans?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh no, we call them oreiai. If there's many. If it's just one, we say oreias!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Though they're cute, they can be naughty.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Sometimes, they run off with concept crystals. And Hermes has to run after them!

dialogue.name: MEMNON
dialogue.text: The desire to learn is a good thing. I wish you well in your endeavors, my dear familiar.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh! This creation is perfect!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But...I don't remember seeing it before. Perhaps it's new?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Anyway, I'll try reading its mind. That's my power!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hmmm... I can't read it. Or maybe...there's nothing to read?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Wait... Please, wait... I'll try again. With you this time...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Greetings! Can you hear me?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: This is my power. I can read the emotions of those around me, and project my emotions to others in return.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I am not actually speaking to you in your mind. Rather, you are converting my emotions into words and intention─a process performed subconsciously by intelligent life-forms.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: This ability is vital to my mission, for it allows me to interact with intelligent beings even should they communicate via unknown languages or other nonverbal means.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: As a consequence, I am clumsy at speaking...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Yet though I struggle to express myself in this fashion, Hermes wants me to speak as much as possible, for everyone has thoughts and feelings that they may wish to hide...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I harbor an affection for you. One that is difficult to define.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Aside from the fact that you share common traits with us, your thoughts are complex. Prismatic. They draw me in, and leave me wanting to know more.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Out of respect for your privacy, I will refrain from using my power when speaking with you. Nevertheless, I want you to know that I wish to be your friend.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Did you...hear me?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Heh heh, good! Now it's my turn again! So...what are you good at?

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Fighting.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Crafting.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Gathering.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Playing.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: It's a secret!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ooh, fighting! That must mean you're strong!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes is strong too. But he doesn't like to fight. Even when creations fight him.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh, not creating...but crafting? Putting things together with your hands...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: That sounds like fun! I can't use creation magicks. But maybe I can learn to craft!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ooh, gathering! I like gathering too!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: What do you gather? Where do you go? How do you get there? Do you fly too!?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Playing? I'm still not sure what that means...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes says, “Let's play.” But then he goes for a walk. Or looks at creations. It's fun, but no different from work.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ooh, a secret! That's something you want to hide! Just leave it to me...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: There! I've blocked it out. I can't block everything─not strong feelings. But that wasn't too strong.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I-I think we might be bothering it...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's keep going. We'll go and see Euanthe next. She's usually in a small building. One on the west row.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's go and see Euanthe. She's usually in a small building. One on the west row.

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: Well now, I don't believe I've seen you before.

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: Well, well, if it isn't Meteion. I see you've brought a friend today.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Greetings, Euanthe! Um, an apple. Could you make me an apple?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: The kind Hermes likes. Covered in syrup. I want to share it with Forename!

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: Oh, candied apple? Hermes is certainly partial to them, but you know you can't eat, Meteion. You weren't made to do so.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: B-But I like it too...

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: It may seem that way, but it's due to your ability to share others' feelings. You've taken Hermes's likes for your own.

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: In any case, I can't prepare an apple right now, but I'll bring one for Hermes soon. I promise.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Forename... I wanted to show you my favorite thing. Then I could ask about yours. But I failed...

dialogue.name: Q7
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: Tell her what you like.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: Say nothing.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ooh, that's what you like? Yes... Yes, I can feel it! Your joy and happiness!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: And it makes me happy too! Thanks for sharing it with me, Forename!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Well, we've walked and talked a lot. Maybe Hermes has finished talking too. Shall we go and see?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Well, we've walked and talked a lot. Maybe Hermes has finished talking too. Shall we go and see?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I hope Hermes isn't sad anymore...

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: Between you and me, Hermes's eating habits are atrocious. We may not be reliant upon food to the extent that our smaller creations are, but our diets eventually catch up with us.

dialogue.name: EUANTHE
dialogue.text: If we don't consume the requisite balance of nutrients, we grow weak and lethargic. Yet Hermes consumes candied apples as if they were a staple...

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: What, back already? Pity. A bit longer and we might have snuck away without you...

dialogue.name: HYTHLODAEUS
dialogue.text: Ah, excellent timing. 'Twas a refreshing constitutional, I hope?

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Is Meteion still outside?

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: There you are. I can see the fresh air has done Meteion good.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Forename wanted to learn about you and Elpis. So I taught herhim!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: About this place. About my power. About your favorite food!

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: I'm not sure if that last one will be of any use...

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: But I do appreciate your keeping Meteion company. While you were away, I finished speaking with our guests.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: Finished? Hardly. You requested time to consider the invitation, so we have no choice but to occupy ourselves with an inspection of your work.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: My apologies...

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: It has been decided that Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus will accompany me as I tend to my duties.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: If you wish to learn more, perhaps you would like to come too?

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: I'm compelled to remind you that shehe is in no way associated with the Convocation. We simply chanced to meet at Propylaion.

dialogue.name: EMETSELCH
dialogue.text: There is no guarantee that the matters we discuss will remain private.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: I do not mind. To see the joy herhis presence brings Meteion, I cannot imagine our mysterious friend harbors malicious intent.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Forename is kind. Really, truly! SheHe taught me as much as I taught herhim!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: You're coming, of course? To watch Hermes? You're bound to learn lots and lots!
